title: Exfoliative cytologic method in the diagnosis of gastric cancer
brief_description: Shows how early diagnostic methods of detecting uterine and vaginal cancer in early 1940s have been applied to development of a technique using a gastric balloon to obtain tissue and blood samples to isolate gastric malignancy. Expert comment at conclusion suggests findings have been significant by this method.
